title: Just bought lb and i am bad at her and want help to be better at her

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
HALP me PLS, any tips on the build and the order to pick abilities

HELP WOULD BE MUCH APPRECIATED

replies.body:
YAIMONE covered most of LB's build path, what I would recommend doing for skill order is:
If you opponent isn't pushing lane hard, and either has good mobility or is easy to click and nuke (immobile, but had unreliable cc) then I recommend levelling your Q as it grants instant damage that is rather high.
If the opponent is pushing lane and/or you need to escape them if they engage (Kat, Zed, Talon) then levelling W is generally better as it allows you to wave clear much easier, as well as save yourself quite a bit from them.

I think the most difficult thing to master with LB is making sure that when you ult you are ulting and using the ability that you mean to.
 Build her like a typical burt mage, items depending on what you require in landing phase. 
Start either {{item:1076}}  or {{item:2041}}  (usually flask works well)
Some people like to build mana regen in the form of {{item:3174}}  but  some people choose to skip it all together. If you think you can burst down the enemy rush a {{item:3128}} {{item:3135}} {{item:3089}} and if against heavy ad rush {{item:3191}}. Experiment with builds and see what suits you. 

In terms of ability order it depends on what you like. I generally tend to max my Q, W, E in that order but I have friends who do it differently. 

Have fun :D
